price: ហើយចូរអ្នក(មូហាំម៉ាត់)កុំព្រួយបារម្ភចំពោះពួកគេ និង កុំពិបាកចិត្ដចំពោះអ្វីដែលពួកគេរៀបចំល្បិចកលនោះឱ្យសោះ។
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيۡقٖ مِّمَّا يَمۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥzan ʿalayhim walā takun fī ḍayqin mimmā yamkurūna
